955780.name: Enderal: The Bard Songs
955780.description:
The bard songs from the award winning role-playing adventure Enderal: The Shards of Order.

Includes the German, English and Polish bard songs.

German

Singers: Lara Trautmann, Jerryl, Britta Wempe, Maria Fetsch (25 Tracks) Lyrics: Frank Bartholomai Music: Frank Bartholomai, Marvin Kopp

English

Singers: Lara Trautmann, Jip van Kakerken, Jocelyn Ahlf, Lauren Synger (25 Tracks) Lyrics: Frank Bartholomai Music: Frank Bartholomai, Marvin Kopp

Polish

Singers: Liz Katrin (11 Tracks) Lyrics: Liz Katrin, Frank Bartholomai Music: Frank Bartholomai

Audio file format: FLAC
Download size: 700 MB
Download location: \Enderal\DLC\Enderal - OST - The Bards of Enderal\
